B

banUser() - Method in class controller.AdminController
Bans a user for a time
banUser(String, LocalDateTime) - Method in class usecases.user.AdminFacade
Temporarily ban a user.
banUser(String, LocalDateTime) - Method in class usecases.user.BanUser
Ban a user until a specified date-time, if the user is bannable (implements the IBannable interface), otherwise throw an exception.
BanUser - Class in usecases.user
 
BanUser(UserRepository) - Constructor for class usecases.user.BanUser
Use-cass class for banning users.
BasicUser - Class in entity.user
 
BasicUser(String, String) - Constructor for class entity.user.BasicUser
An entity-level class for users that are not admins.
BasicUser(String, String, LocalDateTime) - Constructor for class entity.user.BasicUser
Overloaded constructor to construct a entity.user.BasicUser with a custom initial ban date-time.
